DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to compare the effect of Polytrim Ophthalmic Solution and Moxifloxacin Ophthalmic Solution in treating your child's pink eye. Both these medications are approved by the Food and Drug Administration, for treatment of conjunctivitis. This study will investigate if both of the medications are equally good.
DOC.criteria: 1 18 years of age with presumed bacterial conjunctivitis. Previous antibiotics or to receive systemic antibiotic.
